product.name: CoverGirl LastBlast Clump Crusher Mascara
product.description:
A breakthrough in no-clump mascara! Get 200% more volume and zero 
clumps. Features an innovative double-sided brush with lash-loading and 
clump-combing zones to crush clumps.Features: 200% more volume, zero clumpsInnovative curved brushSuper-volumized, beautifully separated lashes
